description.displayText: We hired Kara to take care of me when I had my surgery, she is such a sweet soul, she was a lifesaver for me, she showered me, comb my hair, assisted with my medications and she always ensure I am on time with them, helping me to the bathroom and in and out of my wheelchair. One morning, after she came to work and get me set, I didn't hear her, so I called her, she came and told me she's fine, at that time she cleaned my entire apartment and that wasn't apart of her duty, it brought tears to my eyes, I couldn't thank her enough as my apartment was very dirty due to the fact that I was unable to clean it. I kept telling her thanks and offered to pay her and she resist it, she told me it's the least and she was happy to help, she also taught me that not everything you do in life, you should expect to be rewarded for, just put your heart in it and that's the best reward. She said as long as she can help, she will and I should not try to mess up her reputation by offering her money.

description.displayText: I hired Kara to fill in a couple days as our caregiver had to leave. It was the best thing I have done, I have no regrets, she took care of my mom so well, she is very patient, tolerable because my mom can be such a pain in the ass but Kara never gets frustrated, she just smile and do her job. I would recommend her at all times.

I would recommend her at all times.

description.displayText: Kara is a very hardworking and loving soul who puts others interest at heart, she is very caring and treat others as she would like to be treated. I have no regret in hiring her to take care of all my kids and families on a whole. I make no hesitation in recommending her. My kids love her so much, she never let them feel out of place and my mom is so obsessed with her tender personality. We love and appreciate her so much. Hiring Kara to take care of your family would be an unforgettable experience.
